title: The 50 best places to buy vintage in Britain, as chosen by The Telegraph's fashion editors
text:
The second-hand market will be 1.5 times bigger than fast fashion by 2028, says new research. So now's the time to get on board. These are the top destinations to shop, according to The Telegraph's fashion editors...

Charity shops

Mary's Living and Giving, UK-wide

Save the Children's collaboration with Mary Portas has transformed the charity shop. These spaces are exciting hubs that vary depending on the location - for every upscale destination stuffed with McQueen gowns there's another full of 1970s gems. savethechildren.org.uk
